org.texgen.textures.complex
Class Flame

java.lang.Object
  org.texgen.textures.AbstractTexture
      org.texgen.textures.signal.GradientSignalTexture
          org.texgen.textures.complex.Flame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Texture
public class Flame
extends GradientSignalTexture

Creates a firey marble type texture. Comes with 3 different gradients to use.

Author:
Andy Gibson

Constructor Detail

Flame

public Flame()

Flame

public Flame(ColorGradient gradient,
             double uOffset,
             double vOffset,
             double speed,
             int octaves,
             double size)
Parameters:
gradient - Color gradient to use (defaults to Flame.redFlame)
uOffset - offset for the u components (default to 0)
vOffset - offset for the v component (defualts to 0)
speed - How fast the texture moves acrosst the surface (default is 3)
octaves - Number of octaves used to generate the marble effect (default is 7)
size - Size of the marble effect (default 1.2)
